Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli

Class ParsingCommand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.ParsingCommand
public class ParsingCommand
extends java.lang.Object
This class receives, sanitizes and processes user input and acts accordingly.

    • ParsingCommand

      public ParsingCommand​(Utils utils, CLI cli, java.io.PrintWriter out, java.util.Scanner in, java.lang.Boolean debug)
      Constructor of Parsing Command
      Parameters:
      utils - Instance of Utils class to be used for utility methods.
      cli - Instance of CLI class that is associated with this instance of ParsingCommand.
      out - Instance of PrintWriter class to print to console.
      in - Instance of Scanner class to read from console.
      debug - boolean to set debug-mode.

      Returns:
